original_text: When Ahab heard that Naboth was dead, he got up and went down to take possession of Naboth’s vineyard.
korean_text: 아합은 나봇이 죽었다 함을 듣고 곧 일어나 이스르엘 사람 나봇의 포도원을 차지하러 그리로 내려갔더라

sentences.original_text: When Ahab heard that Naboth was dead
sentences.korean_translation: 아합이 나봇이 죽었다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: to take possession of Naboth's vineyard
